description:
Speaker: Tin Marković

Experiences and lessons learned from tackling extremely demanding code. How to bring order to mismanaged code and elevate the code base to a standard that's acceptable in today's tech environment.

Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2019 conference.
https://pycon.de

More details at the conference page: https://de.pycon.org/program/FTVNPK
Follow us on Twitter:  https://twitter.com/pydataberlin, https://twitter.com/pyconde
title: Refactoring in Python: Design Patterns and Approaches
